ai-ud6.1:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.
ai-ud6.1:1.3_0: Then the Buddha robed up in the morning and, taking his bowl and robe, entered Vesālī for alms.
ai-ud6.1:1.4_0: Then, after the meal, on his return from alms-round, he addressed Venerable Ānanda,
ai-ud6.1:1.6_0: Let’s go to the Cāpāla shrine for the day’s meditation.”
ai-ud6.1:2.1_0: “Yes, sir,” replied Ānanda. Taking his sitting cloth he followed behind the Buddha.
ai-ud6.1:2.2_0: Then the Buddha went up to the Cāpāla shrine, where he sat on the seat spread out.
ai-ud6.1:2.3_0: While sat the Fortunate One addressed venerable Ānanda, (saying):
ai-ud6.1:3.1_0: “Ānanda, Vesālī is lovely. And the Udena, Gotamaka, Sattamba, Bahuputta, Sārandada, and Cāpāla shrines are all lovely.
ai-ud6.1:3.4_0: delightful is the Seven Mangos Shrine,
ai-ud6.1:3.5_0: delightful is the Many Sons’ shrine,
ai-ud6.1:3.8_0: Whoever has developed and cultivated the four bases of psychic power—made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them—may, if they wish, live on for the eon or what’s left of the eon.
ai-ud6.1:3.9_0: The Realized One has developed and cultivated the four bases of psychic power, made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them. If he wished, the Realized One could live on for the eon or what’s left of the eon.”
ai-ud6.1:3.10_0: If he wished, the Realized One could live on for the eon or what’s left of the eon.”
ai-ud6.1:4.1_0: But Ānanda didn’t get it, even though the Buddha dropped such an obvious hint, such a clear sign.
ai-ud6.1:4.3_0: “Let the Buddha remain for the eon, reverend Sir,
ai-ud6.1:4.4_0: For his mind was as if possessed by Māra.
ai-ud6.1:4.6_0: And for a third time, the Buddha said to Ānanda:
ai-ud6.1:5.1_0: “Ānanda, Vesālī is lovely. And the Udena, Gotamaka, Sattamba, Bahuputta, Sārandada, and Cāpāla shrines are all lovely.
ai-ud6.1:5.4_0: delightful is the Seven Mangos Shrine,
ai-ud6.1:5.5_0: delightful is the Many Sons’ shrine,
ai-ud6.1:5.8_0: Whoever has developed and cultivated the four bases of psychic power—made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them—may, if they wish, live on for the eon, or what’s left of it.
ai-ud6.1:5.9_0: The Realized One has developed and cultivated the four bases of psychic power, made them a vehicle and a basis, kept them up, consolidated them, and properly implemented them. If he wished, the Realized One could live on for the eon or what’s left of the eon.”
ai-ud6.1:5.10_0: If he wished, the Realized One could live on for the eon or what’s left of the eon.”
ai-ud6.1:6.1_0: But Ānanda didn’t get it, even though the Buddha dropped such an obvious hint, such a clear sign.
ai-ud6.1:6.3_0: “Let the Buddha remain for the eon, reverend Sir,
ai-ud6.1:6.4_0: For his mind was as if possessed by Māra.
ai-ud6.1:7.1_0: Then the Buddha said to Venerable Ānanda,
ai-ud6.1:8.1_0: Then Māra the Wicked, not long after Ānanda had left, went to the Fortunate One,
ai-ud6.1:8.1_1: and after approaching he stood on one side.
ai-ud6.1:8.2_0: While standing on one side the Wicked Māra said this to the Fortunate One:
ai-ud6.1:9.1_0: May the Blessed One now become fully extinguished! May the Holy One now become fully extinguished! Now is the time for the Buddha to become fully extinguished.
ai-ud6.1:9.2_0: May the Happy One attain Complete Emancipation,
ai-ud6.1:9.3_0: now is the time, reverend Sir, for the Fortunate One’s Final Emancipation.
ai-ud6.1:9.4_0: Sir, you once made this statement:
ai-ud6.1:9.5_0: ‘Wicked One, I will not become fully extinguished until I have monk disciples ...
ai-ud6.1:9.6_0: Today you do have such monk disciples.
ai-ud6.1:9.7_0: May the Blessed One now become fully extinguished! May the Holy One now become fully extinguished! Now is the time for the Buddha to become fully extinguished.
ai-ud6.1:9.8_0: May the Happy One attain Complete Emancipation,
ai-ud6.1:9.9_0: now is the time, reverend Sir, for the Fortunate One’s Final Emancipation.
ai-ud6.1:10.1_0: Sir, you once made this statement:
ai-ud6.1:10.2_0: ‘Wicked One, I will not become fully extinguished until I have nun disciples who are competent, educated, assured, learned ...’
ai-ud6.1:10.3_0: Today you do have such nun disciples.
ai-ud6.1:10.4_0: May the Blessed One now become fully extinguished! May the Holy One now become fully extinguished! Now is the time for the Buddha to become fully extinguished.
ai-ud6.1:10.5_0: May the Happy One attain Complete Emancipation,
ai-ud6.1:10.6_0: now is the time, reverend Sir, for the Fortunate One’s Final Emancipation.
ai-ud6.1:11.1_0: Sir, you once made this statement:
ai-ud6.1:11.2_0: ‘Wicked One, I will not become fully extinguished until I have layman disciples who are competent, educated, assured, learned ...’
ai-ud6.1:11.3_0: Today you do have such layman disciples.
ai-ud6.1:11.4_0: May the Blessed One now become fully extinguished! May the Holy One now become fully extinguished! Now is the time for the Buddha to become fully extinguished.
ai-ud6.1:11.5_0: May the Happy One attain Complete Emancipation,
ai-ud6.1:11.6_0: now is the time, reverend Sir, for the Fortunate One’s Final Emancipation.
ai-ud6.1:12.1_0: Sir, you once made this statement:
ai-ud6.1:12.2_0: ‘Wicked One, I will not become fully extinguished until I have laywoman disciples who are competent, educated, assured, learned ...’
ai-ud6.1:12.3_0: Today you do have such laywoman disciples.
ai-ud6.1:12.4_0: May the Blessed One now become fully extinguished! May the Holy One now become fully extinguished! Now is the time for the Buddha to become fully extinguished.
ai-ud6.1:12.5_0: May the Happy One attain Complete Emancipation,
ai-ud6.1:12.6_0: now is the time, reverend Sir, for the Fortunate One’s Final Emancipation.
ai-ud6.1:13.1_0: Sir, you once made this statement:
ai-ud6.1:13.2_0: Not until my spiritual life is successful and prosperous, extensive, popular, widespread, and well proclaimed wherever there are gods and humans.’
ai-ud6.1:13.3_0: Today your spiritual life is successful and prosperous, extensive, popular, widespread, and well proclaimed wherever there are gods and humans.
ai-ud6.1:13.4_0: May the Blessed One now become fully extinguished! May the Holy One now become fully extinguished! Now is the time for the Buddha to become fully extinguished.
ai-ud6.1:13.5_0: May the Happy One attain Complete Emancipation,
ai-ud6.1:14.1_0: When this was said, the Buddha said to Māra,
ai-ud6.1:14.3_0: The final extinguishment of the Realized One will be soon.
ai-ud6.1:14.4_0: Three months from now the Realized One will finally be extinguished.”
ai-ud6.1:15.1_0: Then at the Cāpāla shrine the Fortunate One, mindfully, with full awareness, relinquished the life-process.
ai-ud6.1:15.2_0: When he did so there was a great earthquake, awe-inspiring and hair-raising, and thunder cracked the sky.
ai-ud6.1:16.1_0: Then, knowing the significance of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud6.1:17.2_0: And the continuation-process the Sage relinquished.
ai-ud6.1:17.4_0: He broke continuity of self like a coat of mail.”
